title: Apple Juice White Nicotine Pouches by Cuba
description: TRY CUBA APPLE JUICE WHITE NICOTINE POUCHES Apple Juice White Nicotine Pouches by CUBA taste like sweet fresh juicy apple juice with a fresh flavour and aroma. Apple juice white is designed to provide an exceptional and enjoyable nicotine experience especially if you prefer fruity nicotine pouch flavours. View all Cuba Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Stong Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 25MG Per Gram | 16MG Per Pouch Apple flavoured nicotine pouches Refreshing tingling sensation with each pouch Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free Discreet and suitable for all occasions MORE ABOUT APPLE JUICE FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Apple Nicotine Pouches offer a captivating and unique flavour experience with the sweetness of ripe apples. These pouches introduce a tangy and refreshing flavour that tingles your taste buds. MORE ABOUT CUBA NICOTINE POUCHES Cuba is manufactured by Nicotobacco, one of the leading suppliers of nicotine pouches in Poland. Nicotobacco also manufactures Cuba sister brand Baron. Cuba offers a range of mint flavours. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Cuba Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Extra Strong Nicotine per Gram 25 MG Nicotine per Pouch 16 MG Flavour Name: Apple Juice White Flavour: Fruity Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
